reg_mobile_message: Please provide your 10 digit registered Mobile number to proceed
gustmessage: Thank you for choosing our hospital for your healthcare needs. In our effort to consistently meet and exceed your expectations, we kindly request you to take just two minutes to provide feedback on the experiences you had during the first day of your hospital stay.
detractor: Please describe reason for low rating
recommendationmessage: On a scale from 0-10, how likely are you to recommend this hospital to your friends or family members?
yourreason: Your reason for selecting our hospital
recognizeateam: Please help us recognize a staff member of our hospital who may have performed services beyond your expectations.
thankyou: Thank you for taking time out to provide the feedback.
happythankyoumessage: Kindly rate us on our Google review page by clicking on the below link.
unhappythankyoumessage: We sincerely apologize for not meeting your expectations. We would like to regain your trust. Our executive will get in touch with you.
